snippet: Cristiano Ronaldo scored a hat trick on Sunday as European champion Real Madrid claimed its second Club World Cup title by beating Japanese side Kashima Antlers 4-2 after extra time....
lead_paragraph: Cristiano Ronaldo scored a hat trick on Sunday as European champion Real Madrid claimed its second Club World Cup title by beating Japanese side Kashima Antlers 4-2 after extra time.

headline.main: Ronaldo Hat Trick Leads Real Madrid to Club World Cup Title
headline.print_headline: Ronaldo Hat Trick Leads Real Madrid to Club World Cup Title
